title: Exposing What REALLY Happens On Brand Trips
description:
Promoted Instagram posts are not always what they seem. Today on Fool Coverage, we're talking about all things brand trips: the good, the bad, and the foolish. We tell you our horror stories and give you our tips on how to get on the radar of your favorite beauty brands. Plus, we'd never forget our unsolicited advice and juicy viewer secrets. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Manny MUA & Laura Lee & Studio71
